Welcome to this RPG. 

Well an small view of what's going is follow:

Some Decepticons and Predacons are shooting againts a Maximal (Angel 
Prime.) in USA

Most of Predacons are involved in a civil war in Mongolia.

A neutral base are improving their defences somewhere of Rockies

Maximal is trying to escape of Decepticon's base 

CIbertronian Fire Maximal's improving their defences. (Africa)

That's a quick view of what's going on here
